features.featureTitle: Save all 14 newly uploaded project photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ using the following filenames: work-01.jpg (60417559408__EA07A836-4DBF-4202-B2B6-336CE9DC4F64.jpeg), work-02.jpg (IMG_2193.jpeg), work-03.jpg (IMG_7416.jpeg), work-04.jpg (IMG_7407.jpeg), work-05.jpg (IMG_3062.jpeg), work-06.jpg (60418777983__B4A1B7E7-D0BE-4D92-827F-4719EDF3DE81.jpeg), work-07.jpg (IMG_3573.jpeg), work-08.jpg (IMG_0619.jpeg), work-09.jpg (IMG_2833.jpeg), work-10.jpg (IMG_7766.jpeg), work-11.jpg (IMG_2569.jpeg), work-12.jpg (IMG_0039.jpeg), work-13.jpg (IMG_7794.jpeg), work-14.jpg (IMG_2641.jpeg).

Update the Gallery (Our Work) component to remove all previously used project photos and replace them exclusively with the 14 new static assets (work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg) loaded from /assets/generated/. The gallery layout, lightbox functionality, navigation, and all other UI elements must remain unchanged.
